roleset.name: lose (blood) quickly
roleset.note: HEMORRHAGE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hemorrhage' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. VN class exhale-40.1.3-1. No Framenet entry. No comparison. (from hemorrhage.01-v predicate notes)
HEMORRHAGING-N NOTES: Based on Sharp data. Comparison to hemorrhage.01. Hemorrhage.01 is a member of VN class exhale-40.1.3-1. No FN class.Framed by Katie. (from hemorrhaging.01-n)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Control Data Corp., which just months ago *trace* was hemorrhaging financially, thinks it will be healthy enough soon to consider repurchasing public debt.

example.name: transitive, metaphorical
example.text: John's dot-com startup was hemorrhaging cash daily.

example.name: both args
example.text: His hemorrhaging of blood was quickly control.
